author: ktf
body:
This will prevent that #8480 gets merged into `CMSSW_7_5_ROOT5_X` by automatic forward porting once the former gets merged into `CMSSW_7_5_X`.

This PR was created via:

```
git fetch wmtan
git fetch cms-sw
git checkout -b avoid-merge-8480 cms-sw/CMSSW_7_5_ROOT5_X
git merge -s ours wmtan/CompilationFixesForCondFormatsAndRecoBTag
git push ktf HEAD:avoid-merge-8480
```
title: Avoid merging #8480 into CMSSW_7_5_ROOT5_X.
